source_sentence: 爾時，世尊復告四天王言：「我今與汝大力雄猛不可害輪大明呪句，如是呪句，過去億百千萬諸佛之所演說，汝若持此大力雄猛不可害輪大明呪句，一切諸魔及魔眷屬尚不敢近何能觸嬈。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the four heavenly kings, "Now, I'm going to give you this great incantation of the mighty and powerful unharmful wheel, which has been taught by billions and billions of buddhas in the past. If you hold this great incantation of the mighty and powerful unharmful wheel, how could all the demons and their followers dare to approach it and even touch it?"

source_sentence: 此是汝等四大天王，大力雄猛不可害輪大明呪句，如是呪句，過去億百千萬諸佛之所演說。
translation: These are the four great heavenly kings' great incantations of the mighty and powerful harmless wheel, and such incantations were taught by billions and billions of buddhas in the past.

source_sentence: 汝若持此大力雄猛不可害輪大明呪句，一切諸魔及魔眷屬尚不敢近何能觸嬈。」
translation: If you hold this great, powerful, and unharmful mantra, how could all the Māras and their followers dare to approach it, and how could they disturb it?"

source_sentence: 爾時，所有一切諸魔及魔眷屬皆悉驚怖無有勢力，各各羞慚向佛合掌。
translation: At that point, all the Māras and their followers were terrified and powerless, and they each bowed their palms to the Buddha in shame and modesty.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊復告毘沙門天王言：「我今與汝北方大力雄猛不可害輪大明呪句，汝以持此大力雄猛不可害輪大明呪故，於己眷屬及他眷屬，天、龍、夜叉、羅剎、阿修羅、乾闥婆、鳩槃茶、餓鬼、毘舍遮、富單那、迦吒富單那尚不敢近，何能觸嬈？
translation: The Bhagavān then again addressed the Vaiśravaṇa, saying, "Now, I've given you this great, powerful, and unharmful Dhāraṇī spell of the north, and because you uphold this great, powerful, and unharmful Dhāraṇī spell, you won't dare to approach your own retinue or the retinues of others, gods, dragons, yakṣas, rājas, asuras, gandharvas, kumbhāṇḍas, hungry ghosts, piśācīs, pūtanas, or kaṭapūtanas, so how could you ever touch them?

source_sentence: 汝於一切惡鬼神所，當得大力雄猛不可害輪。」
translation: In the presence of all evil spirits, you will attain a powerful, majestic, and harmless wheel."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊作是語已，即說呪曰：「哆絰夜他(一)　勿檀泥(二)　鉢羅勿檀泥(三)　勿達那跋帝(四)　渠唎乾陀利(五)　朱唎(六)　旃茶唎(七)　頞唎毘闍耶末提(八)　驅驅勿檀泥(九)　跋羅(十)　吠羅(十一)　勿檀泥(十二)　蘇婆呵(十三)「汝以此呪北方，當得大力雄猛不可害輪，於己眷屬及他眷屬尚不敢近，何能觸嬈？」
translation: After saying this, the Bhagavān then spoke the mantra, saying, "Dharmadhātu(1) Maitrāyaṇī(2) Prabhākaramitra(3) Maitrāvatī(4) Khudrakandhari(5) Jurai(6) Kaṇṭhari(7) Aniruddha(8) Kakuda Maitrāyaṇī(9) Bhalā (10) Vīra(11) Maitrāyaṇī(12) Sūbaha(13) 'With this mantra, you will attain a vigorous, powerful, and harmless wheel in the north, so how could you touch your own retinue or the retinues of others if you didn't dare to approach them?'"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊復告提頭賴吒天王言：「我今與汝東方大力雄猛大明呪句，乃至當得不可害輪。」
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān again addressed the god Dhṛtarāṣṭra, saying, "Now, I'll give you this great, powerful, majestic, and luminous spell for the east, so that you will attain the wheel of non-harmony."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊作是語已，即說呪曰：「哆絰夜他(一)　丘嘍闍帝(二)　勿嘍闍帝(三)　鉢羅帝虱蠆(四)　摩訶薩[黍-禾+唎](五)　崎囉跋帝(六)　欝那婆帝(七)　伽樓婆帝(八)　求嘍鞞(九)　勿嘍鞞(十)　求嘍勿嘍鞞(十一)　求嘍求嘍(十二)　勿嘍乾提(十三)　勿嘍闍帝(十四)　阿羅娑婆帝(十五)　摩羅娑婆帝(十六)　黟泥迷泥(十七)　多豆婆南(十八)　多豆婆南(十九)　蘇婆呵(二十)「汝以此呪東方，當得大力雄猛不可害輪，於己眷屬及他眷屬尚不敢近，何能觸嬈？」
translation: 爾時，世尊作是語已，即說呪曰：「哆絰夜他(一)　丘嘍闍帝(二)　勿嘍闍帝(三)　鉢羅帝虱蠆(四)　摩訶薩[黍-禾+唎](五)　崎囉跋帝(六)　欝那婆帝(七)　伽樓婆帝(八)　求嘍鞞(九)　勿嘍鞞(十)　求嘍勿嘍鞞(十一)　求嘍求嘍(十二)　勿嘍乾提(十三)　勿嘍闍帝(十四)　阿羅娑婆帝(十五)　摩羅娑婆帝(十六)　黟泥迷泥(十七)　多豆婆南(十八)　多豆婆南(十九)　蘇婆呵(二十)「汝以此呪東方，當得大力雄猛不可害輪，於己眷屬及他眷屬尚不敢近，何能觸嬈？」

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊復告毘樓勒叉天王言：「我今與汝南方大力雄猛大明呪句，乃至當得不可害輪。」
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān again addressed the Virūḍhaka god king, saying, "Now, I'm going to give you this powerful, heroic, and great incantation for the south, which will lead to the attainment of the wheel of non-harmony."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊作是語已，即說呪曰：「哆絰夜他(一)　耆唎耆唎(二)　耆盧那跋帝(三)　[口*兮]泥(四)　呵膩泥(五)　阿泥那跋帝(六)　群籌群籌(七)　蘇婆呵(八)「汝以此呪南方，當得大力雄猛不可害輪，於己眷屬及他眷屬尚不敢近，何能觸嬈？」
translation: After saying this, the Bhagavān then spoke the mantra, saying, "Dhāraṇyatha(1) Jīlī Jīlī (2) Jīlunabhadra(3) [mouth*oxi]nir (4) Haniṇyinī (5) Aniruddha (6) Gṛdhrakūṭa (7) Subhāhu (8), 'With this mantra to the south, you will attain a powerful and imposing wheel of invulnerability, so how could you touch your own retinue or the retinues of others who wouldn't dare to approach you?'"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊復告毘樓博叉天王言：「我當與汝西方大力雄猛不可害輪大明呪句，汝以持此大力雄猛不可害輪大明呪故，於己眷屬及他眷屬，諸龍、夜叉、羅剎、阿修羅、乾闥婆、鳩槃茶、餓鬼、毘舍遮、富單那、迦吒富單那等尚不敢近，何能觸嬈？」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the Virūpākṣa Heavenly King, "I will give you this great incantation of the Great and Mighty and Inconvenient Wheel of Harmlessness for the West; because you uphold this great incantation of the Great and Mighty and Inconvenient Wheel of Harmlessness, how could you touch dragons, yakṣas, rājas, asuras, gandharvas, kumbhāṇḍas, hungry ghosts, piśācīs, pūtanas, and kaṭapūtanas when they wouldn't dare to approach your own retinue or the retinue of others?"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊作是語已，即說呪曰：「哆絰夜他(一)　阿毘婆嘍泥(二)　婆嘍拏跋帝(三)　勿囉竭囉跋帝(四)　婆嘍泥(五)　婆嘍拏耶世(六)　憂受婆羅(七)　鉢囉受娑[黍-禾+唎](八)　膩受婆隸(九)　摩呵受婆隸(十)　受婆邏(十一)　摩身達囉舍(十二)　娑闍鞞(十三)　薩婆哆囉毘唎帝(十四)　訖利多耶世失蠆(丑芥反)(十五)　蘇婆呵(十六)「汝以此呪西方，當得大力雄猛不可害輪，於己眷屬及他眷屬尚不敢近，何能觸嬈？」
translation: After saying this, the Bhagavān then spoke the mantra, "Dharmadhātu (1) Abhi-vibhāṇī (2) Bāloo-nabhūti (3) Bṛhatphala (4) Bāloo-nirbhūti (5) Bāloo-nāya (6) Aśvakarabhūmi (7) Pārājapati (8) Nirgrantha (9) Mahājapati (10) Pārājapati (11) Mahêndrāsaka (12) Sājāvatī (13) Sarvâstārāvṛttī (14) Kṛtyāyaśasena (15) Subhāva (16), 'With this mantra, you will attain a powerful, majestic, and harmless wheel in the west, which will not dare to approach your own retinue or the retinues of others, so how could you touch Khloe?'"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊復告四大天王，而說偈言：「諸山有稱譽，　　自在者化作，　極兩鷄羅娑，　　香仙佉羅擔，　風火及雪山，　　日月所居處，　北方常護持，　　世尊真妙法。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the four celestial kings and spoke in verse, "Those mountains are praised, created by the Śubha, the two most powerful ones, the fragrant Kharādīya, the mountains of wind and fire and snow, the abode of the sun and moon, and the northern direction, where they always safeguard the Bhagavān's truly wonderful teaching.

source_sentence: 般支般遮羅，　　訖尼伽羅度，　彼等常護持，　　四維佛正法。
translation: They always guard the Buddha's true teaching in the four intermediate directions, whether it's Pañcika or Kaini Kharādī.

source_sentence: 地神大地神，　　黑色大黑色，　羅睺毘摩質，　　須質波羅陀，　婆稚睒婆利，　　及牟真隣陀，　共護於下方，　　世尊真妙法◎。」
translation: The earth deity, the great black earth deity, Rāhu Vimalacī, Sukhyuparatha, Vatsyapālī, and Mucilinda are together guarding the Bhagavān's truly wonderful Dharma down below."

source_sentence: ◎大集經月藏分第十二忍辱品第十六之一爾時，有一阿修羅王，名曰火味。
translation: At the time, there was an asura king named Fire Taste.

source_sentence: 在彼會中，從座而起，舉手而指羅睺羅阿修羅王，向四百億阿修羅王，作如是言：「此羅睺羅阿修羅王，是我等輩尊重師長，能以福慧益諸眾生自在勇猛，諸阿修羅中最勝第一。
translation: In that assembly, he got up from his seat, raised his hand, pointed to King Rāhula asura, and said to the 40 billion asura kings, "This Rāhula asura king is a respected teacher and elder of our group who is able to benefit sentient beings with merit and wisdom, is comfortable and courageous, and is the most superior and highest of all the asuras.

source_sentence: 羅睺羅王及與我等，皆為瞿曇之所欺[夌*欠]，為令佛法得熾然故，付囑餘眾而不見與，故令我等受大恥辱。」
translation: Both King Rāhula and we were deceived [dawdled*undefiled] by the Gautama, and in order to make the Buddha's teaching blazing, we entrusted the others with it but didn't give it to them, which caused us to suffer great shame."

source_sentence: 次復，有一阿修羅王，名鎮星毘摩，作如是言：「我等昔來，各各於己四天下中，與釋提桓因共相齊等，今如野干逐師子後。
translation: Furthermore, there was an asura king named Venus Vimalakīrti who said, "In the past, we were each on par with Śakra Devānām-Indra in the four heavens, but now we're like Nāgasena chasing after Shizi.

source_sentence: 我等寧可捨此凡下，還於本國城邑宮殿。
translation: We'd rather abandon this worldly existence and return to our own cities and palaces.

source_sentence: 又我寧死，何能忍受如是[夌*欠]辱？
translation: How could we endure such [dawdling*un] humiliation when we'd rather die?

source_sentence: 此是大怨，令我等輩生大憂苦。」
translation: This is a great offense that causes our group great sorrow and suffering."

source_sentence: 時羅睺羅阿修羅王，作如是言：「眾生寧可最勝人邊受其罵辱，不於凡下而得讚歎。
translation: Rāhula, the king of asuras, then said, "Wouldn't it be better for sentient beings to be insulted by the most superior person than to be praised by an inferior person?

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 令多好人所輕賤故。
translation: It's because they cause many good people to despise them.

source_sentence: 此天人師，於三界中最勝自在，住於彼岸，善知時宜隨其所應，故如是也。」
translation: This teacher of gods and humans is the most excellent and sovereign in the three realms, abides on the other side, and well knows the appropriate time to follow him; therefore, it's like this."

source_sentence: 爾時，月藏菩薩摩訶薩，合掌向佛一心敬禮，而作是言：「導師當觀此羅睺羅阿修羅王，具有如是堅慧勝慧，安住堅信樂善樂忍，持戒清淨深信三寶，不久速成無上導師。
translation: At that point, the moon-store bodhisattva Mahāsattva joined his palms in unified homage to the Buddha and said, "Teacher, you should observe that this Rāhula asura king possesses such resolute wisdom and superior insight, abides in firm faith, enjoys good tolerance, maintains precepts, is pure, and deeply believes in the Three Treasures, and will soon become a supreme teacher.

source_sentence: 唯願世尊，熾然法故，應當與此羅睺羅分。」
translation: May it be that the Bhagavān, because of the blazing Dharma, will give this Rāhula a share."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告四百億阿修羅王，而說偈言：「汝先具諸德，　　各已住淨信，　如是昔諸佛，　　囑法與汝等。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed 40 billion asura kings and spoke in verse, "You previously possessed all the virtues to have abided in pure faith, such as these past buddhas who entrusted the Dharma to you.

source_sentence: 我今以此法，　　悉亦付囑汝，　當以諸方便，　　護持我法眼。
translation: Now, with this teaching, I've also entrusted you with all of them, so by using various skillful means, you will guard my Dharma eye.

source_sentence: 汝等作是福，　　增滿大智海，　各於自境界，　　守護我正法。
translation: Doing so will enhance the great ocean of wisdom, and in your own realm, you'll guard my right teaching.

source_sentence: 住法常樂忍，　　護持定根者，　汝等若如是，　　咸供三世佛，　常詣於善趣，　　命智果具足，　於世流轉時，　　得離諸惡道。
translation: Those of you who abide in the everlasting forbearance of the Dharma and guard the faculty of concentration, if you do so, will make offerings to the buddhas of the three times, always enter a good destiny, and have the full realization of life and wisdom, and when you're in the transmigration of the world, you'll be freed from bad destinies.

source_sentence: 諸求勝報者，　　當熾我法眼，　各於己國土，　　遮障惡眾生。」
translation: Those who seek superior rewards should blaze the eye of my teaching, each in his own land, and obscure the hindrances of bad sentient beings."

source_sentence: 爾時，諸阿修羅悉起合掌，咸作是言：「我等阿修羅，　　各各於己國，　休息一切惡，　　熾然世尊法。
translation: At that point, the asuras all rose and joined their palms, saying, "We asuras, each of us in our own country, rest all evil and blaze the Bhagavān's teaching.

source_sentence: 習行法施者，　　於惡作護持，　增長三精氣，　　離惡住善道。」
translation: Those of us who practice giving the Dharma will guard against evil, increase the three vital energies, and abide in the good path free of evil."

source_sentence: 爾時，諸來一切大眾、諸天及人乾闥婆等，咸皆歎諸阿修羅言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: At that point, all the masses, gods, humans, and gandharvas from all over the world praised the asuras, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊亦復歎彼四百億阿修羅王及諸眷屬，作如是言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān also praised those 40 billion asura kings and their retinues, saying, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 妙丈夫輩！
translation: A wonderful group of people!

source_sentence: 汝能如是，是名供養三世諸佛，當懃護持養育我法。
translation: If you can do this, this is called making offerings to the buddhas of the three times, and you will diligently protect and nourish my teaching.

source_sentence: 佛之法眼而得熾然，令三寶種久不斷絕，是故我今將於汝等及諸眷屬，付囑十方一切諸佛現在住世未涅槃者，及付賢劫一切菩薩摩訶薩，汝等常與彼諸阿修羅生生相值。
translation: The Buddha's Dharma eye becomes blazing bright, and it causes the seeds of the Three Treasures to be uninterrupted for a long time; therefore, I'm going to entrust you and your retinues to all the buddhas in the ten directions who are now living in the world and have yet to reach nirvāṇa, and to all the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and you will always be born in the company of those asuras.

source_sentence: 汝當於此賢劫之中得成正覺出於世時，當與汝等作上施主，護持正法持戒第一，得禪三昧具足忍力。
translation: When you attain perfect enlightenment in this good eon and emerge from the world, you'll be given to be great benefactors, uphold the right teaching, be first in upholding precepts, and attain meditation and concentration with the power of forbearance.

source_sentence: 如此賢劫最後如來，名曰盧遮應、正遍知，出現於世。
translation: The final Tathāgata of such a good eon will be called Rucika, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Omniscient, and will appear in the world.

source_sentence: 爾時，盧遮當授彼等阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記，便得速滿六波羅蜜，不久當為無上法王，得入無畏涅槃大城。
translation: At that point, Roca will grant them the mark of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment, and they'll quickly fulfill the six perfections, soon become the unsurpassed Dharma king, and enter the great city of fearless nirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 如是若復有諸眾生，若現在世及未來世，於我法中出家修道三業相應，若復放人出家修道，若復有能勤加護持養育供給我諸聲聞、比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，令三寶種得不斷絕，若有能修檀波羅蜜乃至般若波羅蜜，若有營造塔廟形像及以修故，種種捨施供養供給四方眾僧，置立寺舍及以修故。
translation: Thus, suppose there are sentient beings, both in the present and in the future, who leave home and cultivate the three karmic activities associated with my teaching, suppose there are people who leave home and cultivate their religious practice, suppose there are people who diligently guard, nourish, and make offerings to our śrāvakas, monks, bhikṣus and nuns, laymen, and laywomen, so that the seeds of the Three Treasures may not be cut off, suppose there are people who cultivate the perfection of giving and the perfection of wisdom, suppose there are people who build stūpas and temple images and cultivate them, and give alms and offerings to the monks in the four directions, erecting temples and monasteries and cultivating them.

source_sentence: 又復於彼四方僧寺，捨施種種衣服、臥具、器物所須，及施田宅、財寶、園林、僮僕給使乃至畜生。
translation: At those four monasteries, they also give alms of various kinds of clothing, bedding, and necessities, as well as gifts of land, property, gardens, servants, messengers, and even animals.

source_sentence: 若復見他捨施諸物還追奪者以力遮護，若復施我聲聞弟子衣服飲食臥具湯藥一切所須。
translation: If he sees another person giving away something and chases after it, he'll try to protect it, and if he also gives my śrāvaka disciples clothing, food, bedding, and all the necessities of medicine, he'll give it to them.

source_sentence: 我之所有聲聞弟子，或有因緣遭遇苦惱，若以自力若假他力方便令脫，我以如是諸眾生等，悉皆付囑十方現在一切諸佛，及付賢劫所有菩薩摩訶薩等，令其攝受生得相值。
translation: If there are causes and conditions for all my disciples to encounter suffering and distress, and if I make them escape by my own power or by the power of others, I will entrust all these sentient beings to all the buddhas of the present in the ten directions and to all the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and others of the good eon, so that they will be collected, accepted, produced, and worthy of each other.

source_sentence: 「若彼賢劫諸佛出世，是諸眾生於彼佛所作大施主，守護正法持戒第一，得禪三昧具足忍力。
translation: "If those buddhas of the good eon were to appear in the world, these sentient beings would be great benefactors of that Buddha, would guard the right principles, would be the best in upholding precepts, and would attain meditative concentration and perfect forbearance.

source_sentence: 如此賢劫最後如來出現於世，于時彼佛當授彼等阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記，便得速滿六波羅蜜，不久當為無上法王，得入無畏涅槃大城。」
translation: When the final Tathāgata of such a good eon appears in the world, that Buddha will grant them the mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, and they'll quickly fulfill the six perfections and soon become unsurpassed Dharma kings who will enter the great city of fearless nirvāṇa."

source_sentence: 爾時，復有無量億百千眾生，悲淚滿目瞻仰如來作如是言：「我今觀諸大悲世尊所有解脫，出於三界一切諸道生死牢獄，捨於渴愛離世八法及我我所憍慢煩惱，離於一切十二有支，知一切法猶如虛空住不顛倒，常於眾生起大悲心。
translation: At the time, measureless millions of hundreds of thousands of sentient beings looked up to the Tathāgata with tears of compassion and said, "Now, I've observed the liberation of the greatly compassionate Bhagavān, who has escaped the prison of birth and death in all the three realms, abandoned thirst and craving, parted with the eight worldly dharmas and the afflictions of pride in self and what belongs to self, parted with all 12 branches of existence, knows that all things are like space and abide without being mistaken, and always gives rise to the mind of great compassion for sentient beings.

source_sentence: 然諸如來為眾生故，令此法眼及三寶種於此娑婆久住不滅故加護持。
translation: Still, the tathāgatas guard the Dharma eye and the seeds of the Three Treasures for the sake of sentient beings, so that they'll abide here in sahāna for a long time and not perish.

source_sentence: 如來今復以諸天、龍、夜叉、羅剎、乾闥婆、緊那羅、迦樓羅、摩睺羅伽、鳩槃茶、餓鬼、毘舍遮、富單那、迦吒富單那、人、非人等，寄付諸佛及諸菩薩。
translation: The Tathāgata now also entrusts the buddhas and bodhisattvas with the gods, dragons, yakṣas, rāṣas, gandharvas, kiṃnaras, garuḍas, mahoragas, kumbhāṇas, hungry ghosts, piśācīs, pūtanas, kaṭapūtanas, humans, nonhumans, and so forth.

source_sentence: 彼諸眾生，現在未來若布施若持戒若修定慧，於此佛法精勤相應，寄付諸佛及諸菩薩摩訶薩等，為滿六波羅蜜令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提故。
translation: Those sentient beings who give generosity, observe precepts, cultivate concentration and wisdom in the present and future, and diligently apply themselves to these buddhas, entrust them to the buddhas and bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas in order to fulfill the six perfections and attain unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若有眾生厭苦求樂，無不於現在世及未來世方便精勤，護持養育熾然法眼紹三寶種而能得之。」
translation: If there are sentient beings who are weary of suffering and seek happiness, there's no one who doesn't skillfully and diligently guard and nurture the blazing Dharma eye, preserving the seeds of the Three Treasures and attaining them in the present and future worlds."

source_sentence: 佛言：「如是，如是。
translation: The Buddha said, "So it is, so it is.

source_sentence: 如汝所言。
translation: Just as you said.

source_sentence: 若有愛已厭苦求樂，應當護持諸佛正法，從此當得無量福報。
translation: If there are lovers who grow weary of suffering and seek happiness, they should safeguard the true Dharma of the buddhas, and from there they'll attain measureless rewards of merit.

source_sentence: 若有眾生，為我出家剃除鬚髮被服袈裟，設不持戒，彼等悉已為涅槃印之所印也。
translation: If there are sentient beings who leave home for me, shave off their hair, put on the reddish-brown robes, and assume they don't observe the precepts, they've all been sealed by the seal of nirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 若復出家不持戒者，有以非法而作惱亂罵辱毀呰，以手刀杖打縛斫截，若奪衣鉢及奪種種資生具者，是人則壞三世諸佛真實報身，則挑一切天人眼目，是人為欲隱沒諸佛所有正法三寶種故，令諸天人不得利益墮地獄故，為三惡道增長盈滿故。
translation: If someone who leaves home again and doesn't observe the precepts, if they unlawfully cause disruption, insult, abuse, beat, bind, and chop people up with a sword, or if they take away their clothing or bowl and various necessities, that person will destroy the true reward bodies of the buddhas of the three times, provoke the eyes of all gods and humans, desire to hide the seeds of the three treasures of the right Dharma from the buddhas, cause gods and humans to be denied benefit and fall into hell, and contribute to the growth and fullness of the three evil destinies.

source_sentence: 「何以故？
translation: "Why is that?

source_sentence: 我昔為於一切眾生修菩薩行，為此法眼於諸眾生起大悲心，捨己身血猶如大海，與諸乞者捨頭猶如毘福羅山，眼耳亦爾，捨鼻猶如百千突盧那，捨舌猶如十突盧那，捨手捨脚各皆亦如毘福羅山，捨皮可覆一閻浮提，亦捨無量象馬、車牛、奴婢、妻子及以王位與諸乞者，亦復捨於無量國土、城邑、宮殿、村落、舍宅、寺廟、園林、衣服、臥具、山澤、林藪與諸乞者。
translation: In the past, when I was cultivating the bodhisattva practice for all sentient beings and arousing the mind of great compassion for sentient beings because of this eye of the Dharma, I gave up my own blood just like the ocean, gave up my head just like Mount Vipula with the beggars, gave up my nose just like a hundred thousand tumuli, gave up my tongue just like ten tumuli, gave up my hands and feet just like Mount Vipula, gave up my skin to cover a single jambudvīpa, gave up measureless elephants, horses, chariots, oxen, slaves, wives, and royal positions with the beggars, and also gave up measureless lands, cities, palaces, villages, mansions, temples, groves, clothing, bedding, mountains, swamps, and woodlands with the beggars.

source_sentence: 「於諸佛所受持禁戒而無缺犯，一一佛所無量供養，一一佛所稟受無量那由他百千法門，受持讀誦護持戒行善修三昧陀羅尼忍。
translation: "I've upheld the precepts without fail, made measureless offerings to each Buddha, accepted measureless hundreds of thousands of teachings from each Buddha, and maintained, read, recited, and protected the precepts and practices, skillfully cultivating the tolerance of the samādhi-dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 又我亦曾供養恭敬無量無邊菩薩摩訶薩，供養恭敬無量緣覺，供養無量佛聲聞眾，供養無量到果聲聞，供養無量外道仙人，供養無量父母師長，供養無量病苦之者，亦於無量苦逼眾生無救護者為作救護，無歸依者為作歸依，無趣向者為作趣向，令其安住及以供養。
translation: I've also made offerings to and honored measureless and limitless bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, made offerings to and honored measureless pratyekbuddhas, made offerings to measureless audiences of buddhas, made offerings to measureless śrāvakas who have reached the fruit of Buddhahood, made offerings to measureless sages of non-Buddhists, made offerings to measureless parents, teachers, and elders, made offerings to measureless sick and suffering people, and made offerings to measureless suffering beings who are not given aid, who are given refuge when there's no refuge, and who are given refuge when there's no destination, making offerings to those who are not headed for it.

source_sentence: 我已無量長遠劫數修諸苦行持戒威儀梵行具足。
translation: I've cultivated ascetic practices for measureless, long eons, maintaining precepts, observing restraint, and perfecting the religious practice.

source_sentence: 「諸仁者！
translation: "Gentlemen!

source_sentence: 我已如是於彼三大阿僧祇劫悲愍一切苦眾生故，發大堅固勇猛之心，久修無上菩提之行。
translation: Thus, for three incalculable eons, I've shown compassion for all suffering sentient beings, developed a resolute and courageous mind, and cultivated the practice of unsurpassed bodhi for a long time.

source_sentence: 我今於此盲冥世間無大導師儉法之時，極惡增長白法盡時，五無間業誹謗正法、毀呰賢聖與不善根相應眾生，瞋惡穬澁離諸羞恥無有慈愍，不觀後世可怖畏事，於如是等諸眾生中，發心願成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Now, when I was blind and in the dark world without a great teacher to fetch the Dharma, when I grew extremely evil and ran out of white dharma, I denigrated the right Dharma with five kinds of unremitting activity, disparaged sentient beings with good and noble roots and unwholesome roots, strayed into anger and violence, abandoned shame, had no compassion, and didn't contemplate the fearful things of the afterlife, and among such sentient beings I aroused the resolve to achieve supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「復於一切淨佛國土所棄眾生中降大法雨，復願與彼諸眾生等除如金剛堅固煩惱，彼等眾生隨其所欲於三乘菩提令不退轉。
translation: "Furthermore, sending down a great dharma rain among all the sentient beings discarded in the pure buddha lands, he also wishes to remove with those sentient beings the adamantine afflictions and make them not turn back from the three-vehicle bodhi according to their desires.

source_sentence: 復願救度三惡眾生安置善道及涅槃樂，與彼眾生作正法眼加護令得久住於世長夜熾然。
translation: May he also save the three bad sentient beings, place them on a good path and the bliss of nirvāṇa, and give them the eye of the right Dharma to protect them so that they may live in the world for a long time and blaze through the night.

source_sentence: 彼諸眾生於我法中出家剃髮被服袈裟不持禁戒，若有供養彼等人者，如是眾生亦得大果，何況為我出家持戒住法相應，供養侍者即得無量阿僧祇大福德聚！
translation: If those sentient beings leave home, shave their hair, put on the reddish-brown robes, and don't observe the precepts in my teaching, and if they make offerings to them, such sentient beings will also attain great rewards, not to mention the fact that they leave home for me, observe the precepts, and abide in conformity with the teaching, and that making offerings to their attendants will lead to an incalculable amount of incalculable great merit!

source_sentence: 何況復能種種供養我諸聲聞聖弟子眾，而當不得無量不可說阿僧祇大福德聚！
translation: How could it be possible to make various offerings to our śrāvaka noble disciples and not attain an unspeakably unspeakably great stock of merit?

source_sentence: 是故我今於如是等諸眾生中，於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提而成正覺。
translation: Now, therefore, among all these sentient beings, I've become perfectly enlightened at the stage of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「一切世間天人中最以大悲故，建立一切諸聲聞眾為上福田，所謂得向八大丈夫。
translation: "Most of all worldly gods and humans, it's because of great compassion that I've established all the śrāvakas as a field of superior merit, which is called attaining the eight great human beings.

source_sentence: 以是緣故，所有眾生於現在世及未來世應當深信佛法眾僧，彼諸眾生於人天中當得受於勝妙果報，不久當得入無畏城，如是乃至供養一人為我出家及有依我剃除鬚髮著袈裟片不受戒者，供養是人亦得乃至入無畏城。
translation: For this reason, all sentient beings in the present and future worlds should have deep faith in the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṃgha, and those sentient beings will experience the wonderful rewards among humans and gods and will soon be able to enter the city of fearlessness; thus, even if they support a person who leaves home for me or depends on me to shave off their hair and wear a piece of the reddish-brown robe without accepting the precepts, supporting that person will also enable them to enter the city of fearlessness.

source_sentence: 以是緣故我如是說，若復有人為我出家不持禁戒，剃除鬚髮著袈裟片，有以非法惱害此者，乃至破壞三世諸佛法身報身，乃至盈滿三惡道故。
translation: For this reason, I thus explain that if another person leaves home for me and doesn't observe the prohibited precepts, shaves off their hair and puts on a piece of the reddish-brown robe, and harms them with unlawful acts, that person will even destroy the Dharma body and reward body of the buddhas of the three times and will even fill the three bad destinies.

source_sentence: 是故我上如是告汝，若有愛己求樂離苦，應當精勤護持養育熾然法眼紹隆三寶令不斷絕。
translation: Therefore, I've told you above, if you love yourself and seek happiness and escape suffering, you should diligently guard and nurture the blazing Dharma eye and promote the Three Treasures so that they won't be cut off.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，從此當得無量福報。」
translation: Because of this cause and condition, you will attain immeasurable rewards of merit from this."

source_sentence: 爾時，月藏菩薩摩訶薩復與八千億那由他百千菩薩摩訶薩，俱從座起合掌向佛，一心敬禮作如是言：「如是，如是。
translation: 爾時，月藏菩薩摩訶薩復與八千億那由他百千菩薩摩訶薩，俱從座起合掌向佛，一心敬禮作如是言：「如是，如是。

source_sentence: 大德婆伽婆！
translation: Venerable Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 於我住處月勝世界大師如來日月光，時時稱揚娑婆世界釋迦牟尼佛，昔菩薩時大勇猛力極苦精勤而修諸行，如是菩薩以大慈悲大願力故，今者於彼五濁惡世無間罪業誹謗正法毀呰賢聖不善相應諸眾生中，於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提而成正覺。
translation: At my abode in the moon-shining world, the Tathāgata Tathāgata Sun and Moon Light always praises the Śākyamuni Buddha of the ālaya world as a bodhisattva who used to cultivate practices with great courage and strength and who cultivated them with extreme pain and effort, so that because of his great compassion and vow, the bodhisattva now becomes fully awakened in the unsurpassed, correct enlightenment among sentient beings who denigrate the right teaching, disparage the noble and unwholesome, and are associated with the five turbid evil worlds.

source_sentence: 「『是佛於彼計斷計常瞋惡麁[怤-寸+喿]，無有慈愍歸依邪道，求種種師不觀後世可怖畏事諸眾生中，為之說法。
translation: "'The Buddha teaches those sentient beings who schematically eliminate, contemplate, and always hold anger against debilitating [kaṇḍa-inch+chirping], lack compassion, and turn to wrong paths, seeking various teachers who don't contemplate the frightening things of the afterlife.

source_sentence: 然諸眾生勤作方便欲害釋迦牟尼如來，或以毒藥和食而奉，或以刀杖、惡象、師子、惡牛、惡狗方便欲害，或有謗言而無梵行，或言非男或言是賊，或言殺生，作如是等種種誹謗。
translation: However, those sentient beings who diligently work to harm the Tathāgata Śākyamuni with their skillful means may serve poison and food, or they may wish to harm him with the skillful means of a sword, a harsh elephant, a lion, a harsh cow, or a harsh dog, or they may denigrate him and lack the religious practice, or they may say he's not a man, or they may say he's a thief, or they may say he's killing people, and they may do all sorts of such things as denigrate him.

source_sentence: 或復有以塵土污坌，或有於大眾中麁穬罵詈種種毀呰。
translation: Another might smear him with dust, or he might ridicule him in public with harsh insults and various insults.

source_sentence: 或有於佛住處以諸臭穢不淨之物污令盈滿，或有見者啼泣不喜，或有見者合眼掩面，或有見者背走遠逝，有不欲見閉戶塞窓。
translation: Some may fill the Buddha's abode with smelly, unclean things, some may weep and not rejoice when they see it, some may close their eyes and cover their faces, some may turn their backs and run away, and some may close their doors and shut their windows when they don't want to see.

source_sentence: 而彼釋迦牟尼如來於此一切惡眾生中，而能忍受如是無量眾惡苦事，亦復於彼諸惡眾生不瞋不惱，然復不捨晝夜，常於彼諸眾生起大悲心，一切時處隨逐化之。
translation: Yet, among all these evil sentient beings, the Tathāgata Śākyamuni can endure such measureless and numerous harmful sufferings, yet he also doesn't hate or anger those evil sentient beings and doesn't let up day or night, always arouse great compassion for them, and he guides them at all times and places.

source_sentence: 如少牸牛初生犢子而未長大忽然失之，其母爾時求覓而走。
translation: Like a young cow that has just given birth to a calf and has yet to grow up, suddenly loses it, and its mother then seeks it out and leaves.

source_sentence: 如是釋迦牟尼如來亦復如是，於諸眾生其心平等，以大悲故隨逐而走，於三惡道而拔濟之，置於善道及涅槃樂。
translation: Thus, the Tathāgata Śākyamuni is likewise equal in mind toward sentient beings, chases them away because of great compassion, rescues them from the three bad destinies, and places them in the happiness of the good path and nirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 如是大悲相應具足，今此釋迦牟尼如來娑婆世界而作佛事。』
translation: Thus, being fully endowed with great compassion, the Śākyamuni Tathāgata now conducts Buddha-work in the Saṃkusumāra world.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，於彼一切大眾聞此事已，皆生希奇未曾有心歡喜踊躍，於彼佛前作如是言：『大德婆伽婆！
translation: "At the time, when all the people there heard about this, they all wondered at it, rejoiced and jumped for joy like never before, and said before the Buddha, 'Venerable Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等亦爾，當以精勤大勇猛力經於無量阿僧祇劫修菩提行，行檀波羅蜜乃至行般若波羅蜜，如是善巧方便成熟諸眾生故，而修諸行，猶如釋迦牟尼如來作菩薩時久修菩提行，願於五濁不淨世界惡眾生中，於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提而成正覺，乃至安置一切眾生於諸善道及涅槃樂。
translation: We too will cultivate the practice of enlightenment with diligence and great courage through measureless incalculably long eons, cultivating the perfection of giving and the perfection of wisdom, and thus skillfully ripening sentient beings to cultivate practices just as the Tathāgata Śākyamuni long cultivated the practice of enlightenment when he was a bodhisattva, wishing to attain correct awakening in the unsurpassed, correct path and nirvāṇa bliss for all sentient beings when they are among the five turbid and impure worlds of unwholesome sentient beings.

source_sentence: 我亦如是，願於五濁不淨佛土，於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提而成正覺，如是成熟五無間業，乃至與彼諸不善根相應眾生，安置善道及涅槃樂。』
translation: In the same way, I also wish to become perfectly enlightened in the five turbid and impure buddha-lands while attaining unsurpassed, correct enlightenment and thus ripen five kinds of unremitting activity, even to the point of placing sentient beings associated with those unwholesome roots on good paths and the bliss of nirvāṇa.'

source_sentence: 彼諸眾生即時於日月光佛所，如上所願得授記者。」
translation: Those sentient beings then went to the Sun and Moonlight Buddha and were granted the reporter as they had wished."

source_sentence: 爾時，會中復有無量恒河沙等菩薩摩訶薩，是於十方為見釋迦牟尼佛故，為供養故見大集故而來此者。
translation: At the time, there were measureless rhesus-level bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and others in the assembly who had come from the ten directions to see Śākyamuni Buddha and to make offerings and see the great assembly.

source_sentence: 彼諸菩薩咸同一音作如是言：「大德婆伽婆！
translation: All of those bodhisattvas spoke with one voice and said, "Venerable Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等亦各於己佛土從彼如來各聞如是稱揚世尊，如月藏菩薩之所說也。
translation: We also each heard from the Tathāgata in our own Buddha land that the Bhagavān was thus praised, just as the moon-store bodhisattva had taught.

source_sentence: 於彼各有那由他諸菩薩等，悉皆如是發大誓願，為欲成熟諸眾生故而作佛事，亦如月藏菩薩摩訶薩之所說也。」
translation: There are bodhisattvas and others in that land, each of whom has made a great vow to perform Buddha-work for the sake of ripening sentient beings, just as the moon-store bodhisattva Mahāsattva has explained."

source_sentence: 爾時，復有於彼諸來一切天、龍，乃至一切迦吒、富單那、人、非人等，皆悉合掌作如是言：「我等謝過大悲釋迦牟尼如來、應、正遍知。
translation: At the time, there were also all those gods and dragons from the past, as well as all those kaṭhas, pūtanas, humans, and nonhumans, who all joined their palms and said, "We thank the greatly compassionate Tathāgata Śākyamuni for being the Tathāgata, the Worthy and Perfectly Omniscient One.

source_sentence: 我等於佛，若身口意所作罪過，若於法僧及於世尊一聲聞弟子所作罪過，今於佛前誠心懺悔，願更莫造堅持禁戒。
translation: Now, before the Buddha, we sincerely repent of any sins we've committed with our bodies, speech, or mind, or any sins committed by the Dharma, saṃgha, or any śrāvaka disciple of the Bhagavān, and we hope we won't again adhere to the precepts.

source_sentence: 我等無知猶如小兒不善所行，唯願世尊大悲深愍受我懺悔。
translation: We're ignorant, just like small children who don't do good deeds, so I hope the Bhagavān will have great compassion and profound sympathy for us and accept my repentance.

source_sentence: 我等受寄護持養育世尊法眼，以諸方便令得熾然，護持三寶久住不滅，亦能增長三種精氣遮障諸惡。
translation: We've been entrusted with nurturing the Bhagavān's Dharma eye and making it blaze with various techniques, safeguarding the Three Treasures for a long time without ceasing, and increasing the three kinds of energy that shield them from evil.

source_sentence: 於佛一切聲聞弟子，乃至若復不持禁戒剃除鬚髮著袈裟片者，作師長想護持養育與諸所須令無乏少。
translation: All śrāvaka disciples of the Buddha, even those who shave their hair and wear a piece of the reddish-brown robes if they don't observe the precepts, should think of themselves as mentors, protects, nurtures, and makes whatever is needed, so that there's nothing lacking.

source_sentence: 「若復有諸剎利國王，作諸非法惱亂世尊聲聞弟子；若以毀罵刀杖打斫，及奪衣鉢種種資具；若他給施作留難者，我等令彼自然卒起他方怨敵，及自國土亦令兵起，病疫、飢饉、非時風雨、鬪諍、言訟、誹謗、譏調，又令其王不久復當亡失己國。
translation: "Again, if there are other śrāvaka disciples of the Bhagavān who are unlawfully disturbed by the actions of the king of a bhadra, who are assaulted with swords and knives, who are stripped of their clothing and bowls, or who are given alms by others and make things difficult for them, we will cause them to naturally and instantly raise enemies from other lands and cause their own land to be invaded by soldiers, disease, hunger, unseasonable winds and rain, disputes, arguments, slander, and ridicule, and we will cause the king to lose his own country again soon.

source_sentence: 如是，若復諸婆羅門、毘舍、首陀、男夫婦女、童男童女，若餘天、龍乃至迦吒富單那等，於佛所有聲聞弟子作其惱亂，若奪精氣氣噓其身，乃至惡心以眼視之，我等悉共令彼天、龍乃至迦吒富單那等，所有諸根缺減醜陋不依處所。
translation: Thus, if another Brāhmaṇa, Vaiśravaṇa, Śuddhâvāsa, man, wife, boy, or girl, another god, dragon, or even Kāṭapūdana were to cause a disciple of the śrāvaka disciple of the Buddha to become disturbed, or if he were to steal his energy and boo his body, or even to look at him with evil intent, we would all cause that god, dragon, or Kāṭapūdana to be deficient in their faculties and ugly and not rely on their abodes.

source_sentence: 我以誓力悉令如是。
translation: With the power of my vow, I've caused them all to do so.

source_sentence: 我等遊止及常居處，令彼不復得與我等共住共食，亦復不得同處戲笑，如是擯罰。
translation: When we travel and go to our usual dwelling places, we make it impossible for them to live with us or share food with us, and we also make it impossible for them to laugh or play together, which is a punishment.

source_sentence: 若有惱亂乃至剃髮被服袈裟不持戒者亦復如是。
translation: If they are disturbed, even if they shave their hair and put on the reddish-brown robes, and don't observe the precepts, they'll likewise behave in the same way.

source_sentence: 若復世尊聲聞弟子，乃至無所積聚有慈愍心三業相應，如是時來我等能護，令世尊法眼熾然不滅。」
translation: If there's another disciple of the Bhagavān who's an śrāvaka or who has accumulated nothing but the three activities associated with a compassionate mind, then we can protect them and cause the Bhagavān's Dharma eye to blaze forth and not cease."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊而讚歎言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān praised them, saying, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 諸妙丈夫！
translation: Wonderful men!

source_sentence: 汝若如是則於一切所作事中無諸過失，汝等以是受我付囑護持養育熾然法故，便為供養三世諸佛。
translation: If you do this, then you'll have no faults in anything you do, and because you've been entrusted by me with the task of nurturing and maintaining the Dharma that's blazing, you'll be making offerings to the buddhas of the three times.

source_sentence: 若汝勤加護持養育熾然我法紹三寶種令不斷絕，若有為我已出家者，及與未來諸出家者，汝等亦應護持養育，此是汝等阿耨多羅三藐三菩提因。」
translation: If you diligently guard and nurture the Tejaprabhā Dharma and preserve the seeds of the Three Treasures so that they won't be cut off, you should also guard and nurture those who have left home for me and those who will leave home in the future; this is the cause of your unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment."

source_sentence: 爾時，羅睺羅阿修羅王，與無量百千阿修羅等，俱從座起合掌向佛，一心敬禮作如是言：「大德婆伽婆！
translation: At that point, Rāhula, the king of asuras, and measureless hundreds of thousands of other asuras all rose from their seats, joined their palms together, saluted the Buddha with one heart, and said, "Vṛji Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等亦為勤護養育熾然佛法，令三寶種不斷絕故，為降伏他故，休息遮障一切諸惡故，令三精氣得增長故，復為護持攝受養育世尊所有聲聞弟子及正法故，復為利益諸眾生故，遮諸罪過摧諸惡人降伏諸怨，并除一切邪鬼魍魎息諸鬪諍，成就一切諸禾苗稼，令諸惡人得作善友，悉攝一切散亂者故。
translation: We also work to nurture the fiery Buddha Dharma, so that the seeds of the Three Treasures won't be cut off, to subdue others, to rest and shield all evil, to increase the three vital forces, to preserve, collect, accept, and nurture all the disciples of the Bhagavān and the right teaching, to benefit sentient beings, to shield sins and faults, to destroy evil people and subdue enemies, to remove all evil spirits and monsters, to quell fights, to produce crops, to make evil people good friends, and to gather all those who are scattered.

source_sentence: 又令所欲皆得稱意故，說大陀羅尼，名曰電光噤縮。」
translation: Because it will cause all desires to be fulfilled, it's called the great dhāraṇī of electric light and silence."

translation: "This great dhāraṇī of a dimmed lightning flash is able to fully benefit all sentient beings, even to the point of causing them to desire it.

source_sentence: 若有比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，若餘清信善男子、善女人等，能與禪法相應而住，若復營事，若行蘭若，若在樹下，若在露地，如是人等若能受持讀誦念此電光噤縮大陀羅尼；若有阿修羅、阿修羅婦、阿修羅父、阿修羅母及與兒女，若阿修羅左右、眷屬、男夫婦女及阿修羅給使之人，欲來惱害伺其便者，皆悉不能得彼少分。
translation: If monks, nuns, laymen, laywomen, or any other faithful good sons and women who are able to associate themselves with the teaching of meditation or who are engaged in business, walking in a forest, under a tree, or in the open ground, and if such people can memorize, recite, and recite this great dhāraṇī of silenced light, then none of them will be able to obtain a small portion of it if they are an asura, an asura woman, an asura father, an asura mother, or their children, or if they are an asura's left or right hand, an attendant, a man, a woman, or an asura servant who wants to harm them and wait for their convenience.

source_sentence: 是阿修羅不復還能入己城邑，令其頭破以為七分，如阿梨樹枝。」
translation: That asura won't be able to go back into his town and cause his head to break off and become seven parts like the branch of an arjaka tree."

translation: At that point, all the people from the region praised him, saying, "Good, good!"

translation: At that point, King Vimalacitra asura and a hundred thousand other asuras rose from their seats, joined their palms together, paid homage to the Buddha with one heart, and said, "Venerable Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等亦為護持養育世尊所說正法眼故，乃至增長三種精氣故，復為護持攝受養育世尊所有聲聞弟子故，又為降伏一切怨家令諸惡人皆生歸仰，休息一切所有疾病，伏諸剛強攝諸惡人令作善友具好眷屬，令諸種子得生不壞，成熟一切果實苗稼故，說大陀羅尼名師子遊步。」
translation: It's also for the sake of maintaining and nurturing the eyes of the Bhagavān who teaches the true teaching, even as we increase the three kinds of vitality, and for the sake of maintaining and nurturing all the Bhagavān's śrāvaka disciples, for the sake of subduing all enemies so that all bad people will become venerable, for resting all illnesses, for subduing strong people, for making bad people good friends and good dependents, for causing seeds to grow and not perish, and for ripening all fruits and crops that we speak the great dhāraṇī called lion's roam."

translation: "This lion's great dhāraṇī of wandering can subdue enemies and even ripen all crops.

source_sentence: 若有比丘乃至清信善女人等與禪相應，乃至露地受持讀誦流布如是師子遊步大陀羅尼，若有阿修羅乃至給使欲來惱害伺其便者，終不能得彼之少分，是等亦復不能還入阿修羅城，令其頭破而作七分如阿梨樹枝。」
translation: If monks or even well-intentioned women of good faith and others associated with meditation were to memorize, read, recite, and disseminate such a great dhāraṇī of the lion's roam in the open air, and if an asura or even a messenger desires to come and harm and wait for his convenience, they would never be able to get a small part of it, nor would they be able to go back into the city of asuras and have their heads broken off and turned into seven parts like the branches of an arjaka tree."

source_sentence: 爾時，諸來一切大眾亦皆歎言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: At that point, all the people from all over the world also praised him, saying, "Good, good!"

translation: At that point, King Mucilinda asura and a multitude of hundreds of thousands of other asuras all rose from their seats, joined their palms to the Buddha, paid homage with one heart, and said, "Vṛji Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 此伏諸龍大陀羅尼，悉能休息一切疾病，亦能捲縮打縛一切惡鬼不令為害，能止非時惡風暴雨諸惡毒氣，亦能降伏眼視殺人眾惡龍等斷諸欲著，於諸龍身能作熱惱及能熱惱，其所住處熱惱，其心熱惱其業熱惱所有資生之具。
translation: This great dhāraṇī for subduing dragons is able to calm all illnesses, constrict and bind all evil spirits so that they won't harm them, stop bad winds and torrential rains that are out of season, subdue dragons whose eyes look at people and kill them, and end attachments to desires, make the bodies of dragons feverish and feverish, and make their dwelling places feverish, their minds feverish, and their actions feverish, which are the necessities for livelihood.

source_sentence: 大德婆伽婆！
translation: Venerable Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有比丘乃至清信善女人等與禪相應，乃至露地受持讀誦流布如是降伏諸龍大陀羅尼；若有龍、若龍婦、若龍父、若龍母、若龍兒女、若龍左右、男夫婦女、若龍給使，欲來惱害伺其便者，乃至不能得彼少分，令其反得熱惱之病，頭破七分如阿梨樹枝。」
translation: If there are monks or even well-faithful women who are associated with meditation or who are out in the open and accept, recite, and disseminate the great dhāraṇī for subduing dragons like this, then if there are dragons, dragon-women, dragon-fathers, dragon-mothers, dragon-children, dragons' sons and daughters, dragons' left and right, men, wives, and dragons' messengers who want to disturb and serve them, they won't even be able to get a small part of them, so that they instead become sick with fever and have their heads split seven ways like the branches of an arjaka tree."

source_sentence: 爾時，四天下所有諸龍來在會者皆悉瞋怒，怖彼所來阿修羅城，諸阿修羅令使驚怖不能自安。
translation: At the time, all the dragons of the four worlds who were present at the meeting were enraged and terrified of the city of asuras that had come to them, and those asuras made themselves afraid and couldn't get comfortable.

source_sentence: 爾時，復有娑伽羅龍王從座而起，向諸大龍合掌作禮，而說偈言：「若有見大聖，　　是人則除瞋，　離瞋即為聖，　　應當止恚惱。
translation: It was then that another dragon king named Sāgara rose from his seat, put his palms together in prostration to the great dragons, and spoke in verse, saying, "If there's someone who sees a great sage, this person will remove anger; free of anger, they're noble; they should stop anger and vexation.

source_sentence: 忍辱世第一，　　忍得世間樂，　忍辱離諸怨，　　忍趣安隱城。
translation: Being patient is the best in the world, forbearance attains worldly happiness, patience is free of enmity, and patience leads to the city of peace.

source_sentence: 無量阿修羅，　　恒與我等怨，　但當自容忍，　　佛常如是說。
translation: Countless asuras are constantly at odds with us, but they should tolerate it on their own, as the Buddha always says.

source_sentence: 由瞋趣惡道，　　瞋還增長瞋，　以瞋捨朋友，　　瞋不得解脫。
translation: 'Because anger leads to a bad path, anger grows back, and because of anger we abandon our friends, and anger doesn't lead to liberation.'

source_sentence: 我等畜生道，　　惡戒瞋恚故，　若能除瞋慢，　　得生於人中。
translation: We animals are born in the path of bad morals and anger, but if we can rid ourselves of anger and conceit, we'll be born among humans.

source_sentence: 既得人身已，　　歸佛而出家，　修習解脫行，　　當為大導師。」
translation: Once they've attained human birth, they'll return to the Buddha and leave home, cultivate liberating behavior, and become great teachers."

source_sentence: 爾時，娑伽羅龍王如是說已，一切諸龍皆得忍辱，面色熙怡各坐本處。
translation: After the Sāgara dragon king said this, all the dragons attained patience and sat down at their places with happy countenances.

source_sentence: 爾時，跋持毘盧遮那阿修羅王，復與無量百千阿修羅等俱從座起，合掌向佛一心敬禮作如是言：「大德婆伽婆！
translation: At the time, the asura king Vajraciana and measureless hundreds of thousands of other asuras rose from their seats, joined their palms together, paid homage to the Buddha with one heart, and said, "Venerable Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等亦為護持養育世尊正法，令三寶種不斷絕故，勤降伏他一切惡事，及諸惡人皆悉休息，令三精氣而得增長故，復為救護攝受養育世尊一切聲聞弟子故，說大陀羅尼名休息眾病。」
translation: We also spoke the great dhāraṇī name "Resting the Sick" in order to protect and nourish the Bhagavān's right teaching, cause the seeds of the Three Treasures to be uninterrupted, diligently subdue all other bad deeds and evil people, and cause the three vital forces to grow, and to aid and nurture all the Bhagavān's śrāvaka disciples."

translation: 作是語已，即說呪曰：「多地夜他　摸楞伽摩　摩朋伽摩　阿毘朋伽摩　闍邏朋伽摩　悉多婆毘[口*興](呵朋反)伽摩　跋尸夜毘[口*興]伽摩　餘尼毘[口*興]伽摩　阿舍尼毘[口*興]伽摩　婆呵毘[口*興]伽摩　差(叉梨反)囉毘囉婆梨珊底囉毘恒伽摩　娑伽囉闍邏丘肘闍邏丘肘毘鞞舍丘肘薩婆盧伽　因地利耶丘肘　悉蜜唎底　毘朋楞舍丘肘　蘇婆呵「大德婆伽婆！

source_sentence: 此休息眾病大陀羅尼，能除所有一切病苦，息諸毒害一切惡雹，亦能降伏一切惡龍，令與世尊聲聞弟子奉給所須猶如奴僕。」
translation: This great dhāraṇī for resting many illnesses removes all illnesses and pains, calms all poisonous and harmful hail, subdues all evil dragons, and causes the disciples of the Bhagavān who are śrāvakas to serve what's needed as if they were slaves."

source_sentence: 爾時，諸來一切龍眾諸大龍王皆悉瞋忿，於虛空中即起大雲在阿修羅上，欲聲大鼓欲降大石，雨鐵羂、索[矛*(替-曰+貝)]、鉾刀、杖刀、面鐵、口利、齒口、竹口、瓶口如是等形，為欲害諸阿修羅而不能得。
translation: At the time, all the dragons from the land and all the great dragon kings were furious, and in the sky they raised a great cloud over the asuras, desiring to sound a great drum, desiring to rain down great rocks, raining iron webs, ropes [spears*(ti-ya+pui)], spears, staffs, iron faces, sharp mouths, mouths of teeth, mouths of bamboo, mouths of vials, and so forth, in order to harm the asuras but were unable to do so.
